member.summary: Gets or sets instance name defined for this .

member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the archive.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.LocalOutputAdapter.AutoRefreshMetadata
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether or not metadata is refreshed when the adapter attempts to connect to the archive.

member.summary: Returns a flag that determines if measurements sent to this are destined for archival.

member.summary: Gets flag that determines if this uses an asynchronous connection.

member.summary: Returns the detailed status of the data output source.

member.name: T:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter
member.summary: Represents an output adapter that publishes measurements to TVA Historian for archival.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes this .

member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.summary: Attempts to connect to this .

member.summary: Attempts to disconnect from this .

member.summary: Publishes for archival.
member.exception: Acknowledgement is not received from historian for published data.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.Server
member.summary: Gets or sets the host name for the server hosting the remote historian.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.Port
member.summary: Gets or sets the port on which the remote historian is listening.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.PayloadAware
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the payload boundaries are to be preserved during transmission.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.ConserveBandwidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value that determines the packet type to be used when sending data to the server.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.OutputIsForArchive
member.summary: Returns a flag that determines if measurements sent to this are destined for archival.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.ThrottleTransmission
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value that determines whether to wait for acknowledgement from the historian that the last set of points have been received before attempting to send the next set of points.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.SamplesPerTransmission
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer that indicates the maximum number of points to be published to the historian at once.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets flag that determines if this uses an asynchronous connection.

member.name: P:HistorianAdapters.RemoteOutputAdapter.Status
member.summary: Returns the detailed status of the data output source.
